description: A Flutter application's main entry point with a simple counter and UI setup.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, builds MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a counter.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, manages counter state and UI rebuilds.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point, runs the Flutter app with MyApp as root.

methods.name: _incrementCounter
methods.description: Increments the counter and triggers UI update.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyHomePage's state.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
